Posts.Content: Hi everyone ! I'm brand new here & scared ! My first mammo post breast reduction (1 yr ago), shows "cluster of microcalcifications, associated with a slight density." brad4. Biopsy suggested. I'm hoping this is related to the surgery, as the clusters are "retroaerolar" & this is close to where my breast was cut during surgery. Can anyone help me with info about this ? My biopsy is scheduled for next friday. Thanks !
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications after breast reduction
